mapper.sql: sid, title, pro_desc, url, start_time, end_time, flag, seq
mapper.select:
select count(sid)
from erweima_promotions
sid = #{sid}
and title like "%"#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and start_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and end_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and flag = #{flag}
mapper.insert: insert into erweima_promotions (sid, title, pro_desc, url, start_time, end_time, flag, seq) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into erweima_promotions
sid,
title,
pro_desc,
url,
start_time,
end_time,
flag,
seq,
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update erweima_promotions
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_desc = #{proDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update erweima_promotions set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_desc = #{proDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
